scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "node simulator.js" "set RHEVtest=true&& set RHEVrecord=false&& node server.js"
scripts.start3: node simulator.js&& set RHEVtest=true&& set RHEVrecord=false&& node server.js
scripts.start2: set RHEVtest=false&& set RHEVrecord=false&& node server.js
scripts.test: node simulator.js&& set RHEVtest=true&& set RHEVrecord=false&& node server.js
scripts.record: set RHEVtest=false&& set RHEVrecord=true&& node server.js
